attorneys.attorney_label: LEAD ATTORNEY;PRO HAC VICE;ATTORNEY TO BE NOTICED;

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(C) - CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - POSSESSION; Unlawful Possession With Intent to Distribute Ecstacy.(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant Sentenced to Twenty-Seven (27) Months Incarceration to run consecutive to Count 2 followed by Three (3) Years Supervised Release with conditions; Special Assessment of $100.00 Imposed.

charges.charge_description: 18:924(c)(1) - VIOLENT CRIME/DRUGS/MACHINE GUN; Using, Carrying and Possessing a Firearm During a Drug Trafficking Offense.(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant Sentenced to Sixty (60) Months Incarceration to run consecutive to Count 1 followed by Three (3) Years Supervised Release with conditions; Special Assessment of $100.00 Imposed.
